1191150.name: Null＆Peta -Queen Bug的袭来- Demo
1191150.description:
This is the demo version of Null & Peta -Invasion of the Queen Bug-.

The crazy comedy anime Null & Peta has been reborn as a thumb-threatening action game!
Null supports her sister from the sidelines while Peta equips an absurd arsenal of armaments to vanquish the bugs infesting cyberspace!
Featuring sisterly cooperation, gorgeous event CGs—and plenty of secrets to explore!?
A cute 'n cuddly comedy-action adventure!
1191150.supported_languages:
英语, 日语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
